img1.text: Hello! I'm Maria Guglielmone Ventura, but you can call me 'Gugli.' This nickname started in high school when a classmate could never pronounce my last name correctly, and it stuck as a personal label. The truth is, I love it now, but it wasn't always the case.

img2.text: I have a degree in Audiovisual Communication from Jaume I University in Castellon (Spain). This year, I completed the postgraduate program in Web Development and Design at ESAT, Valencia.

img3.text: I did my internship during my career at a communication agency in Valencia: Eva Montesinos Comunicaci√≥n. After that, I continued as a freelance photographer for music groups in Valencia and also delved into the world of design. Thanks to my year as a freelancer in Valencia, I became interested in the ID3 postgraduate program at ESAT, and now I am a web developer with a lot of creativity.

img4.text: Through my postgraduate program, I've had the opportunity to delve deeper into the multifaceted realm of web development. As a junior frontend developer, I've acquired a diverse skill set that encompasses tools and technologies, which include: Figma, CSS and HTML, WordPress, PHP, Javascript, React, Vite, API integration, CSS Frameworks (Bootstrap), CSS Preprocessors (SCSS), responsive design and web accesibility, package managers (npm) and a little of testing.

img5.text: I've lived my entire life in Castell√≥n (Spain), but two years ago, I moved to Valencia. In this city, I've found a second family that has supported me during these years. Now, I'm seeking a new adventure and I'm open to whatever the future holds for me.

img6.text: I love to travel and discover as much as I can during my journeys. I'm a curious person, and that doesn't change professionally. Transitioning from a photographer to a web developer was a challenging yet immensely enjoyable process. As a junior, I continue to learn new things every day.

img7.text: I'm seeking a job as a junior frontend developer. My passion lies in css, but I'm not afraid to embark on new adventures.

img8.text: In the future, I hope to continue working as a developer while also keeping photography in my life. I feel that once I learn something, there's always a part of it that stays with me.

img9.text: Actually, I'm not very consistent on social media. But I'm working on it, as with everything in life, you have to keep trying.

content.letterSoup: Sometimes I feel like my head is made up of a alphabet soup on which I keep discovering new words.
content.dontCry: Don't cry for the flowers - an invitation to a party. Letters designed by me.
content.genkoa: Poster and logo for Genkoa's project.

aboutMe.title: AboutMe
aboutMe.description: AboutMe was my first project as a web designer and developer. It's a 'one page' based on information about me where you can get to know me a little better.

genkoa.title: Genkoa
genkoa.description: Genkoa is a project carried out for the youth film association 'La Simulaci√≥n.' Genkoa arises from the idea of connecting future artists so that they can develop their art and have their own projects to showcase when seeking their first jobs. It is an initiative to CONNECT ART within the Valencian Community.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.description: Gugli is my portfolio, this very website! On it, I have showcased all my most recent knowledge in an organic way, simulating mobile 'apps.' It has been entirely created by me, from the design process to the development of the website using React.

message.ms2: Don't hesitate to contact me if you want to collaborate with me. üôÜ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è
message.ms3: I am a junior front-end developer with a strong desire to continue learning and expanding my knowledge.

ethicPage.title: Ethical Standards
ethicPage.intro: Welcome to my ethics page, where I share my principles and values as a frontend developer. As a professional in this field, I believe that ethics play a fundamental role in our work and how we interact with our clients and users.

commitment.title: Ethical Commitment
commitment.text: Throughout my career as a junior frontend developer, I've established a strong commitment to ethics in my work. I believe that honesty, integrity, and transparency are paramount in any project. My ethical principles include:

quality.name: Quality
quality.definition: I strive to deliver high-quality work to my clients and end-users. Every line of code and design undergoes rigorous quality control.

userCentric.name: User-Centric Approach
userCentric.definition: My primary focus is the user. I consider them the most important clients, and my work is dedicated to enhancing their experience. All my designs and developments are geared towards providing an exceptional user experience.

communication.name: Clear Communication
communication.definition: I maintain open and honest communication with my clients and collaborators. Transparency at every stage of a project is essential in building strong, trust-based relationships.

privacy.name: Privacy and Security
privacy.definition: I address data privacy and security concerns with the utmost seriousness. I always ensure that user data is protected and handled ethically.

sustainability.name: Sustainability
sustainability.definition: I consider sustainability in my projects and practice sustainable web development whenever possible. Contributing to environmental responsibility is a responsibility I take seriously.

diversity.name: Diversity and Inclusion
diversity.definition: I actively support diversity and inclusion in the tech industry. I believe in equal opportunities for all.

example.title: Practical Examples
example.text: Throughout my career, I've applied these ethical principles in concrete projects. You can explore examples and case studies in my portfolio that demonstrate how my ethical approach has benefited my clients and users.

codeConduct.title: Code of Conduct
codeConduct.text: I follow a professional and ethical code of conduct in all my interactions and collaborations. This code is based on respect, collaboration, and professional ethics.

contact.title: Contact
contact.text: If you wish to discuss any aspect of my ethics or how I apply them in my work as a frontend developer, please feel free to contact me. You can send me a message directly at: info.mariagugli@gmail.com.

ethicPage.toSum: I appreciate your interest in my ethical approach, and I hope this page provides you with a deeper understanding of my values and principles as a frontend professional.

cookiesPage.title: Cookies
cookiesPage.intro: This Cookie Policy explains the use of cookies on our portfolio website. By using our website, you agree to the use of cookies in accordance with this policy.

explainCookie.title: What are Cookies?
explainCookie.text: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your computer or mobile device when you visit a website. They may be used for various purposes, including enhancing your online experience and providing essential functionality.

useCookies.title: How We Use Cookies
useCookies.text: We use cookies on our portfolio website for the following purposes:

essencial.title: Essential Cookies
essencial.description: These cookies are necessary for the proper functioning of our website. They enable you to navigate our site, access secure areas, and use essential features like our contact form.

analytical.title: Analytical/Performance Cookies
analytical.description: We may use cookies to collect anonymous information about how visitors interact with our website. This data helps us improve our site's performance and user experience.

choices.title: Your Choices Regarding Cookies
choices.text: You can choose to accept or decline cookies. Most web browsers automatically accept cookies, but you can usually modify your browser settings to decline cookies if you prefer. Please note that disabling cookies may affect your ability to use certain features of our website, including the contact form.

contactForm.title: Contact Form
contactForm.text: When you use our contact form, we collect the following information:
contactForm.description: We use this information solely to respond to your inquiry and provide you with the requested information or assistance. We do not use this information for any other purpose, and we do not share it with third parties.

updatesPolicy.title: Updates to this Policy
updatesPolicy.text: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time. Please check this page periodically for any updates.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.text: If you have any questions about our Cookie Policy or how we use cookies on our website, please contact us at: info.mariagugli@gmail.com

errorPage.subtitle: We're sorry, we're working on this page.
errorPage.explain: Right now, this content cannot be displayed. Please try again later; we are working to improve this portfolio.
errorPage.newPath: If you want to know more about me or my work:

form.success: Perfect! I've received your message in my email.
